name.ar: Yelp Data Scraper: Scrape Yelp business data
name.am: Yelp web scraper: Extract data from Yelp
name.bg: Scrap Yelp Data: Scrape Yelp data without code
name.bn: Scrap Yelp - Scrape Yelp business data
name.ca: Yelp Extractor: Scrape Yelp business data
name.cs: Yelp Data Extractor: Scrape Yelp business data
name.da: Yelp Export: Scrape Yelp business data
name.de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,et,: Yelp Scraper: Scrape Yelp business data

short.ar: Capture valuable business data from Yelp search results effortlessly and swiftly. One-click extraction for the best results.
short.am: Scrape Yelp local business leads to CSV/EXCEL/JSON. Extract Yelp business details and ratings without using the Yelp API
short.bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Scrape Yelp local business leads to CSV/EXCEL/JSON. Extract Yelp leads including phone numbers, websites, and addresses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Easily export Yelp search results to CSV and Excel with our reliable scraper tool. Say goodbye to the hassle of local business lead generation.

HOW IT WORKS:
1. Search for your desired local business on Yelp.
2. Copy the search link and paste it into the extension.
3. Download the business leads in CSV or Excel format.

FEATURES:
- Extract up to unlimited business leads
- Extract business name, phone number, website, and address from the search results page
- Extract business licenses
- Works across all Yelp global websites, not just a single one
- Search exactly what you're looking for and filter the results
- Save and download search results in CSV, Excel, or JSON formats
- Receive free updates ongoing

EXPORT COLUMNS
#id, #ranking, #business_name, #alias, #price_range, #rating, #review_count, #open_hours, #phone, #website, #categories, #service_offerings, #address, #longitude, #latitude, #business_url, #review_url, #snippet, #image_url, #licenses

MORE JOB EXPORT TOOL
click the "Tool" menu to discover more business leads export tool.

ğŸ‘‹ FAQ
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@niomaker.com.

ğŸ”’ DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you save.

ğŸ’¡ DISCLAIMER
Yelp Data Scraper is not endorsed by or affiliated with the Yelp Corporation, registered in the U.S. and other countries. Yelp is a trademark of the Yelp Corporation.
long.de:
Exportieren Sie Yelp-Suchergebnisse ganz einfach in CSV und Excel mit unserem zuverlÃ¤ssigen Scraper-Tool. Verabschieden Sie sich vom Aufwand der Generierung lokaler GeschÃ¤ftskontakte.

SO FUNKTIONIERT ES:
1. Suchen Sie auf Yelp nach Ihrem gewÃ¼nschten lokalen Unternehmen.
2. Kopieren Sie den Suchlink und fÃ¼gen Sie ihn in die Erweiterung ein.
3. Laden Sie die GeschÃ¤ftskontakte im CSV- oder Excel-Format herunter.

FUNKTIONEN:
- Extrahieren Sie bis zu unbegrenzt viele GeschÃ¤ftskontakte
- Extrahieren Sie Firmennamen, Telefonnummer, Website und Adresse von der Suchergebnisseite
- Extrahieren Sie GeschÃ¤ftslizenzen
- Funktioniert auf allen globalen Yelp-Websites, nicht nur auf einer einzigen
- Suchen Sie genau nach dem, wonach Sie suchen, und filtern Sie die Ergebnisse
- Speichern und laden Sie Suchergebnisse in den Formaten CSV, Excel oder JSON herunter
- Erhalten Sie fortlaufend kostenlose Updates

---

Easily export Yelp search results to CSV and Excel with our reliable scraper tool. Say goodbye to the hassle of local business lead generation.

HOW IT WORKS:
1. Search for your desired local business on Yelp.
2. Copy the search link and paste it into the extension.
3. Download the business leads in CSV or Excel format.

FEATURES:
- Extract up to unlimited business leads
- Extract business name, phone number, website, and address from the search results page
- Extract business licenses
- Works across all Yelp global websites, not just a single one
- Search exactly what you're looking for and filter the results
- Save and download search results in CSV, Excel, or JSON formats
- Receive free updates ongoing

EXPORT COLUMNS
#id, #ranking, #business_name, #alias, #price_range, #rating, #review_count, #open_hours, #phone, #website, #categories, #service_offerings, #address, #longitude, #latitude, #business_url, #review_url, #snippet, #image_url, #licenses
